mapper.insert: INSERT INTO YD_PAY_ORDER ( ID , MERCHANT_NO , ORDER_ID , ORDER_AMOUNT , GOODS_NAME , FUND_PROCESS_TYPE , NOTIFY_URL , MEMO , EXPIRED_TIME , REDIRECT_URL , ERROR_CODE , ERROR_MSG , BIZ_SYSTEM_NO , UNIQUE_ORDER_NO , TOKEN , STATUS , PAY_SUCCESS_DATE , PAY_WAY , CHANNEL , CARD_TYPE , BANK_ID , BANK_CARD_NO , MOBILE_PHONE_NO , USER_ID , UNION_ID , PRODUCT_ORDER_ID , CREATE_TIME , LAST_UPDATE_TIME , BANK_ORDER_ID , MERCHANT_FEE , CUSTOMER_FEE ) VALUES( #{id} , #{merchantNo} , #{orderId} , #{orderAmount} , #{goodsName} , #{fundProcessType} , #{notifyUrl} , #{memo} , #{expiredTime} , #{redirectUrl} , #{errorCode} , #{errorMsg} , #{bizSystemNo} , #{uniqueOrderNo} , #{token} , #{status} , #{paySuccessDate} , #{payWay} , #{channel} , #{cardType} , #{bankId} , #{bankCardNo} , #{mobilePhoneNo} , #{userId} , #{unionId} , #{productOrderId} , #{createTime} , #{lastUpdateTime} , #{bankOrderId} , #{merchantFee} , #{customerFee} )
mapper.update: update YD_PAY_ORDER set status = 'TIME_OUT', UNIQUE_ORDER_NO = #{uniqueOrderNo}, errorMsg = #{errorMsg} where ORDER_ID = #{orderId}
